text: She, a Chinese is a 2009 international co-production drama film directed by Xiaolu Guo. It won the 2009 Golden Leopard at the Locarno Festival. == Cast == * Huang Lu - Li Mei * Wei Yi Bo - 'Spikey' * Geoffrey Hutchings - Geoffrey Hunt * Chris Ryman - Rachid * Hsinyi Liu - London Tour Guide == References == == External links == * * Category:2009 drama films Category:Films directed by Xiaolu Guo
title: She, a Chinese
